text: Soe nyang tem taÊ»at keu Po ureueng nyan 4 Neubri balasan nyang jroh sileupah Nyang han tem taÊ»at adak jih kaya Le that areuta sinoe jikeubah Bandum peue nyang na di ateuh bumoe Teuma lom dumnoe jiteumeung tamah Bandum atranyan jitem teuboh droe Dumnoe keuh paloe azeub geubalah Geuhisap di jih leupah that saket Lom geubri teumpat nuraka juah Nyankeuh nuraka sineubrok teumpat Keubit meularat hana ban peugah
